title: Sonderance
content:
++ Sonderance's Extensive Bibliography In Order of Publication

[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source start=--
|name=Sonderance]]
That's [[*user Sonderance]] to you, bub!
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source end=--]]

[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; margin-bottom:3px; margin-bottom:3px"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Name**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 25%; padding: 12px"]]
**Core Question**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 25%; padding: 12px"]]
**Notes**
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
[[[SCP-4653]]]: Ambrosial Insects and Starving Gods
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
What if the Greek gods ate bug squirts and then starved to death?
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
Written for JamCon 2020 (Theme: "Delicious")
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
[[[SCP-5785]]]: Craptivism
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
What if I tried to make you sad about a dude who teleports his own fecal matter?
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
Written for CorpseCon 2020 w/ ContProcs provided by [[*user deadly bread]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
[[[SCP-5625]]]: Team Non-Anom and the Epidemic of Jamais Vu
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
What if an existential form of rabies led to a slow-burn love story?
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
Written for CupidCon 2021
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
[[[SCP-5640]]]: **DUKE ETHEL, WIELDER OF THE UPWATER CIRCLET**
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
What if I stretched a minor gag from Finding Nemo into a whole article?
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
Written for JamCon 2021 (Theme: "Marine")
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
[[[Sonderance is Cool and Smart]]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
What if I got real meta about this?
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
The author page you're currently looking at
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
[[[Sudoku Puzzles and a Lit Cigarette]]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
What if a basic cartoon trope got angsty?
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
Written for JamCon 2021 (Theme: "Corruption")
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
[[[SCP-6012]]]: Let It Go.
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
What if an immortal dentist caused problems on purpose?
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
Written for 6kon 2021
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
[[[SCP-6531]]]: Anthology of Horrors!
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
What if I gave myself a birthday gift by pretending it was Halloween for some reason?
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]

[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
[[[SCP-7770]]]: Stomachache
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
What if someone ate lucky things? What if her diet didn't agree with her?
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
Written for 7kon 2022
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
[[[SCP-7302]]]: Teratophilia
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
What if love and consumption came to blows?
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
Written for ColdpostCon 2023
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
[[[SCP-8880]]]: Isaac Seder: Son, Warrior, Foe
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
What if a hero failed? What if a story ended very, very wrong?
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
Written for 8kon
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
[[[SCP-8123]]]: Autophobia: String Section
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
What if a bunch of people became one, and then became one in a much worse way?
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 12px"]]
Written for SCP Anthology 2024
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

++ Fun Facts About Sonderance!
* I've downvoted exactly 1 page on this site, ever!
* I've wrestled with God Itself!
* That's all!

[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box-end]]
author: Sonderance
